object.reproducer: Setup several domUs on multiple dom0s and watch the times on them all.
object.summary: Customer is using several DomUs on multiple Xen servers, and they are seeing time differences between the host and guest after some guest uptime regardless of guest clock source setting.
On certain load failures, nf_contrack can fail to properly clean up (properly remove) one of it's pernet_subsys list entries. This leaves the list corrupt as the memory for the entry is released.

object.reproducer: lschp shows stale information in the "Cmg" and "Shared" column.
object.summary: Four s390x patches to be added to kernel-default-3.0.101-0.7.37.1 of SLES12SP1LTSS
